staticContent.content:
Here you will find some links to other sites we manage /operate and to other insurances that may be of interest to you .

 

Our core business is Commercial Insurances – That is insurance of virtually all types for most businesses . Our clients range from firms with turnovers in the hundreds of millions with locations worldwide to a firm with a single principal  - Many clients have come on a recommendation or referral and after many years of being our clients become the new source of referral to us. With almost half a century of insurance broking behind us we tend to know our products and markets !

 

Links to Commercial Insurances – Various 

http://www.burkeins.ie/commercial_insurance.htm

www.insuretheoffice.ie

www.piinsurance.ie

www.centeragency.com
